subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The last-place Atlanta Dream will have the top pick in the W.N.B.A. draft lottery in April. The Washington Mystics received the second pick, followed by the Chicago Sky, the Minnesota Lynx and the Phoenix Mercury. It was the first time the lottery, which includes teams that did not make the playoffs, went according to odds in its eight-year existence.
